name: Great Old One - Arrival
description: "G.O.O ~ Arrival" is an action role-playing game developed by two independent game enthusiasts. We are trying to create a game with a sense of battle that tells the story of the last guardian to save the world in crisis after the arrival of the great old one.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4096 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 64-bit compatible Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 or equivalent Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 512 Mb or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4096 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
